name: Little Martian - Melancholic Blue
description: An original ceramic sculpture, by me, Vanessa Rosa. Laser cut stencils were used to decorate the piece with traditional islamic patterns (that's part of a long research I have on ethnomathematics and patterns throughout history). Face recognition algorithms and face mesh custom animation were added to a photo of the piece to bring it to life in the metaverse. This is one of the first sci-fi ceramics I've created. Part of long term project on future humanoids wondering about archeological discoveries on the little they know about Earth.
